about_the_game:
With the call of duty, the sleeping soldiers will be awakened to steal secret documents, assassinate enemy leaders, rescue their comrades, at the cost of their own lives, but for the revolution!It was all worth it!
  • Select a lurk character and begin the quest.
  • You can exterminate an enemy behind his back without even noticing it.
  • Victory is won when you successfully rescue a prisoner, steal secrets, or assassinate a leader and escape.
detailed_description:
With the call of duty, the sleeping soldiers will be awakened to steal secret documents, assassinate enemy leaders, rescue their comrades, at the cost of their own lives, but for the revolution!It was all worth it!
  • Select a lurk character and begin the quest.
  • You can exterminate an enemy behind his back without even noticing it.
  • Victory is won when you successfully rescue a prisoner, steal secrets, or assassinate a leader and escape.
legal_notice: All materials are owned by WHM studio, no unpacking, no infringement.
name: 潜伏与唤醒 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G1820 / AMD Athlon II X3 455/奔腾4 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB，Shader model 2.0，ATI 9600，NVidia 6600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590 or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Shader model 3.0，NVidia 7600，ATI X1600 Or higher
